page.title: 20GUNSTONE MILL CONTD.
page.content: {FACTS AND FIGURES:}The farm is 60 acres or 25 hectares large, and the land is used for pasture.The only crops grown are vegetables which the Bickleys keep for themselves.There are 40 Freisian cattle,20 young replace- ments,a few calves and 10 beef(Herefords). There is also an apple orchard for cider making.Mr Bickley sells the apples now,though he used to make his own.We call it Scrumpi in Devon. The machines used on the farm are Dung Spreaders,Hay makers,2 tractors.All the hay is baled into large plastic bags holding 1/2 ton each(55 tons altogether). There are two wells on the farm for water(they are not on Mains water). The milk production had to be cut by 10 percent owing to Common Market regulations(too much milk produced).
